careers.title: Careers India & Abroad
careers.subtitle: Let's Work Together and Explore Opportunities

Requirements.title: UI Developer -Freshers
Requirements.desText: UI Developer Lead, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
Requirements.skillsText: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Basics in AngularJS or ReactJS

Requirements.title: AngularJS Developer
Requirements.desText: Angular Developer Lead, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.

Requirements.title: ReactJS Developer
Requirements.desText: ReactJS Developer Lead, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
Requirements.skillsText: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, ReactJS, Redux, Webservices, NodeJS(basics)

Requirements.title: React Native Developer
Requirements.desText: A self-driven and highly motivated App Development Expert who can settle for nothing but the best on user experience and performance.
Requirements.skillsText: Mobile application development, HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, ReactJS, Webservices, Build tools, Ionic Framework

Requirements.title: UX Designer
Requirements.desText: A passionate designer and a self-starter, comfortable with tackling all of the UX steps from user research, exploration and concepts.
Requirements.skillsText: Wireframing, Design solutions. User stories, UX Research, Usability testing, client interactions, Strong communication, and presentation skills

Requirements.title: Visual/UI Designer
Requirements.desText: Visual/UI Designer Lead, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
Requirements.skillsText: Creative designs, User interface designs, Photoshop/Illustrator/Sketch, Must have a good eye for aesthetics: layout, color theory, and typography.

Requirements.title: NodeJS Developer
Requirements.desText: Would know how to be an inspiring team-player.
Requirements.skillsText: NodeJS, RESTful API, MVC, ExpressJS/ReactJS/AngularJS, MySQL/MongoDB, Front-end technologies

Requirements.title: Android Developer
Requirements.desText: Expert/knowledge in Android Build system, Memory usage and profiling of Android applications and services.
Requirements.skillsText: UI skills, Android SDK, Problem-solving skills, Analytical skills, Java, Restful API's

Requirements.title: IOS Developer
Requirements.desText: IOS developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications including mobile phones and tablet computers.
Requirements.skillsText: IOS Framework, Analytical skills, Web technologies, RESTful API's
